name: Animation Creation!
description:
Okay! So this project is an animation editor! Use different colors in an animation. Then click the green arrow button and try the next frame! A shadow of the frame before it will be shown! Click the green checkmark to see your animation. You will also be able to see your FPS. If you do not know FPS is frames per second, so the higher the FPS the faster the animation will be!

Create Line:

Where you want your line to start, click the l key and hold down on it. Move your mouse to somewhere else and release the l key! That will create a line. This feature is not mobile friendly.

Adjust Pen Size:

Act like you are going to zoom in to a page or zoom out to change pen size. This feature is not mobile friendly.
